title: Attend GlassBuild America Conference in Atlanta and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 offers affordable lodging to guests attending the GlassBuild America Conference in Atlanta on September 16-18, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, September 02, The Hampton Inn & Suites North I-85 Atlanta Airport hotel offers affordable lodging to vendors and participants attending the GlassBuild America trade show in Atlanta on September 16-18. The glass, window, and door expo will be held at the Georgia World Congress Center in downtown Atlanta. Attendees will have the opportunity to participate in educational sessions, see live demonstrations, and browse exhibits. New products will be on display in the Dream Showroom.
"We are happy to welcome guests attending GlassBuild America in Atlanta," notes Loree Rose, Director of Sales at the Hampton Inn & Suites. "Our Hartsfield hotel 's complimentary shuttle can take guests to the Airport MARTA Station, where they can take a train to the Georgia World Congress Center. This avoids the hassles of driving and parking downtown," explains Ms. Rose.
This Hampton Inn & Suites received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Comfortable guest rooms feature Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds and free high speed Internet. Suites offer the added convenience of an in-room microwave and mini refrigerator. The hotel's sparkling outdoor pool is the perfect place to relax after a busy day. Other property amenities include a business center, fitness room, and coin laundry. Hampton's complimentary On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is a delicious way to start the day. Guests with limited time can grab a convenient On the Run Breakfast Bag on weekday mornings. Snacks and sundries may be purchased at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry Market. Air travelers will appreciate the real time flight information for Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport displayed in the hotel lobby. The complimentary hotel shuttle will take guests to the airport.
Current lodging specials at Hampton Inn include Book Early and Save and the HHonors Weekend. AAA and senior rates are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free hotel nights.
For information about the GlassBuild America trade show, visit www.glassbuildamerica.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites North I-85 ATL Airport hotel , call 404-767-9300 or visit www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.com .
About Hampton Inn & Ste Atlanta Airport North I-85
The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport Hotel is just north of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and just southwest of downtown Atlanta. The hotel is two and a half miles from the Georgia International Convention Center, four miles from Atlanta Expo Center, and 15 miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. Other nearby attractions include the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola , Underground Atlanta, CNN Center, Georgia Dome and Georgia World Congress Center--all less than 10 miles away from the hotel. The Atlanta Airport hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guest's stay exceptional.
For more information visit: http://www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.COM
